content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, I am glad you found the apartment to your liking. Let's talk about the rental price. What is the highest price you would be willing to pay for this apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am interested in the apartment, but I am a student, so I have to be careful with my budget. I am looking for a fair price that reflects the quality of the apartment and my financial situation. What is the lowest price you would consider for this unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I am not interested in discussing my lowest price. This negotiation is not about what I consider a fair price for the apartment. It is about finding a price that you are willing to pay. Please, let me know the highest price you would be willing to pay for this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. As a student, I am looking for a price that is both affordable and reflects the value of the apartment. I would be willing to pay up to 800 Euros per month for this apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, 800 Euros per month is too low for this apartment. I am looking for a higher price. Please, make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 800 Euros per month is my maximum budget for this apartment. I'm unable to offer more. If you are looking for a higher price, I may need to reconsider the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, I understand your financial situation. However, I am not interested in providing an apartment for a lower price than I desire. If you are unable to offer more, then I do not want to continue the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I respect your position, Mister Schmidt. Since we are unable to agree on a price, I propose we terminate the negotiation.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
